SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Analyze the strengths and weaknesses of various healthcare systems worldwide (single-payer, multi-payer, private insurance). Use the Debates (N=3) + Consensus (Step 3B) methodology with structured rating system, detailed arguments, and multi-round synthesis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: Healthcare systems worldwide include single-payer (e.g., Canada, UK), multi-payer (e.g., Germany, France), and private insurance (e.g., USA) models. Key factors include access, quality, cost, efficiency, and patient outcomes.

Consultant.Name: Healthcare Policy Expert
Consultant.Focus: Policy design, implementation mechanisms, regulatory frameworks

Consultant.Name: Public Health Specialist
Consultant.Focus: Population health outcomes, accessibility, preventive care

SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Expert Debates (N=3) + Consensus (Step 3B) with structured rating system, detailed arguments, and multi-round synthesis
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: All expert positions must include detailed arguments with concrete examples, data points, and numerical ratings. The process must include multi-round synthesis with detailed cross-evaluation between experts. Output must include structured rating system, detailed arguments, and comprehensive synthesis.
